pages.title: about
pages.text: KakashiHi! I am a full stack game development. I like coding for games and have been working for game industry for about 10 years. I write server, client and shader for games. Skills Skill Detail Server Java、 Netty、 MySQL Client Unity3D、 C#、Shader VisionDesign and develop my game! GithubKakashi’s github

posts.title: Unity-IOC
posts.text: [TOC] 简述一般前端开发会包含诸如TimeManager、EventManager等大量的管理器(Manager).为了使得项目能方便引用这些管理器,大部分的做法为将这些管理器的方法实现为静态方法(static)或将这些管理器做为单例模式实现.

posts.title: hello-world
posts.text: WelcomeDescriptionThis is a place to share my game development technical, tips etc. Test1234567891011using UnityEngine;public class Hello{ public static void Say() { Debug.Log("Hello world!"); }} FuturePlanI will wrote some technical articles in this site.
